Body: I am using nexus 4..In my case it is something different.. I am able to browse through browser and even my gmail app is working fine.. but my wifi icons are orange in color(Kitkat 4.4.4)..needs to be white in color.. but i don't know why?The only problem i am facing is that i am unable to check for android updates even if I click check now nothing is happening.. the last checked date remains same which is a old date..
Title: Nexus 4 not connecting to google server(haven't cleared google service framework)
